TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MetadataProperty extends System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem

Docs.summary: Represents a metadata attribute for an item in the [!INCLUDE[vstecado](../../add/includes/vstecado-md.md)] metadata hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You can access every item in the [!INCLUDE[vstecado](../../add/includes/vstecado-md.md)] metadata hierarchy as a strongly typed property bag. The <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType> class provides properties called <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.NamespaceName%2A>, and so on. The <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType> class also inherits a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem.MetadataProperties%2A> property, which is a collection of MetadataProperty objects. When the application creates an instance of the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType> class, the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataItem.MetadataProperties%2A> property automatically contains a collection of MetadataProperty objects for <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.Name%2A> property, <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType.NamespaceName%2A> property, and so on.

Docs.summary: Gets the built-in type kind for this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty">.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind"> object that represents the built-in type kind for this <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty>.

Docs.summary: Gets the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"> class that contains both the type of this <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty> and facets for the type.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"> object that contains both the type of this <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataProperty> and facets for the type.
